Class DecoratorOverlay

java.lang.Object
  maps.gml.view.DecoratorOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Overlay
public class DecoratorOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Overlay

Draws an overlay consisting of Decorators.
